verses.verse: Then came near <S%H5066><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

And they spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them at Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> us cities <S%H5892><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in, with the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> thereof for our cattle. <S%H929><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> out of their inheritance, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5159><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> and their suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>

And the lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites: <S%H6956><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> which were of <S%H4480><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8099><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> had by lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the families <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> and out of the half <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> had by lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the families <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> and out of the half <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%> had out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with <S%H854><s%> their suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are here mentioned <S%H7121><s%> by name, <S%H8034><s%>

Which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> being of the families <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites, <S%H6956><s%> who were of the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> had: <S%H1961><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> theirs was <S%H1961><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> lot. <S%H1486><s%>

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H853><s%> the city <S%H7151><s%> of Arba <S%H704><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Anak, <S%H6061><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> city is Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%> it.

But the fields <S%H7704><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and the villages <S%H2691><s%> thereof, gave <S%H5414><s%> they to Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> for his possession. <S%H272><s%>

Thus they gave <S%H5414><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> <S%H853><s%> Hebron <S%H2275><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> to be <S%H853><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the slayer; <S%H7523><s%> and Libnah <S%H3841><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
And Jattir <S%H3492><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Eshtemoa <S%H851><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
And Holon <S%H2473><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Debir <S%H1688><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>

And Ain <S%H5871><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Juttah <S%H3194><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and <S%H853><s%> Beth-shemesh <S%H1053><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> those <S%H428><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tribes. <S%H7626><s%>

And out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> <S%H853><s%> Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> <S%H853><s%> Geba <S%H1387><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
<S%H853><s%> Anathoth <S%H6068><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Almon <S%H5960><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> were thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>

And the families <S%H4940><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> which remained <S%H3498><s%> of the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> even they had <S%H1961><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of their lot <S%H1486><s%> out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

For they gave <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H853><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs <S%H4054><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> to be <S%H853><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the slayer; <S%H7523><s%> and Gezer <S%H1507><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
And Kibzaim <S%H6911><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Beth-horon <S%H1032><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> <S%H853><s%> Eltekeh <S%H514><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> <S%H853><s%> Gibbethon <S%H1405><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>

<S%H853><s%> Aijalon <S%H357><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> <S%H853><s%> Gath-rimmon <S%H1667><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And out of the half <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4276><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> <S%H853><s%> Tanach <S%H8590><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Gath-rimmon <S%H1667><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> were ten <S%H6235><s%> with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%> for the families <S%H4940><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> that remained. <S%H3498><s%>

And unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> of the families <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> out of the other half <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> they gave <S%H853><s%> Golan <S%H1474><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> to be <S%H853><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the slayer; <S%H7523><s%> and Beesh-terah <S%H1203><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> <S%H853><s%> Kishon <S%H7191><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> <S%H853><s%> Daberath <S%H1705><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
Jarmuth <S%H3412><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> En-gannim <S%H5873><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> <S%H853><s%> Mishal <S%H4861><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> <S%H853><s%> Abdon <S%H5658><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
<S%H853><s%> Helkath <S%H2520><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Rehob <S%H7340><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> <S%H853><s%> Kedesh <S%H6943><s%> in Galilee <S%H1551><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> to be <S%H853><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the slayer; <S%H7523><s%> and Hammoth-dor <S%H2576><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Kartan <S%H7178><s%> with her suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> were thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>

And unto the families <S%H4940><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jokneam <S%H3362><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and <S%H853><s%> Kartah <S%H7177><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
<S%H853><s%> Dimnah <S%H1829><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> <S%H853><s%> Nahalal <S%H5096><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Bezer <S%H1221><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Jahazah <S%H3096><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>
<S%H853><s%> Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> and Mephaath <S%H4158><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And out of the tribe <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> <S%H853><s%> Ramoth <S%H7216><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> to be <S%H853><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the slayer; <S%H7523><s%> and Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%>

<S%H853><s%> Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs, <S%H4054><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jazer <S%H3270><s%> with <S%H854><s%> her suburbs; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> in all. <S%H3605><s%>

So all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> which were remaining <S%H3498><s%> of the families <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> by their lot <S%H1486><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the possession <S%H272><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were forty <S%H705><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs. <S%H4054><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> every one <S%H5892><s%> <S%H5892><s%> with their suburbs <S%H4054><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> them: thus <S%H3651><s%> were all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto their fathers; <S%H1><s%> and they possessed <S%H3423><s%> it, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> therein.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave them rest <S%H5117><s%> round about, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers: <S%H1><s%> and there stood <S%H5975><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them; the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%> into their hand. <S%H3027><s%>

There failed <S%H5307><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> aught <S%H1697><s%> of any <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> came to pass. <S%H935><s%>
